trans-unit.source: Detect and diagnose crashes in Windows Store and Phone apps with Application Insights
trans-unit.target: Detect and diagnose crashes in Windows Store and Phone apps with Application Insights

trans-unit.source: Analyze performance issues in your Windows device app with Application Insights.
trans-unit.target: Analyze performance issues in your Windows device app with Application Insights.

trans-unit.source: Detect and diagnose crashes in Windows Store and Phone apps with Application Insights
trans-unit.target: Detect and diagnose crashes in Windows Store and Phone apps with Application Insights

trans-unit.source: Application Insights is in preview.
trans-unit.target: Application Insights is in preview.

trans-unit.source: If your users experience crashes in your app, you'd like to know about it quickly, and you'd like details about what happened.
trans-unit.target: If your users experience crashes in your app, you'd like to know about it quickly, and you'd like details about what happened.

trans-unit.source: With Application Insights, you can monitor how frequently crashes occur, get alerts when they occur, and investigate reports of individual incidents.
trans-unit.target: With Application Insights, you can monitor how frequently crashes occur, get alerts when they occur, and investigate reports of individual incidents.

trans-unit.source: "Crash" means that the application terminates because of an uncaught exception.
trans-unit.target: "Crash" means that the application terminates because of an uncaught exception.

trans-unit.source: If your app catches an exception you can report it with the <link><linkText>TrackException API[apiexceptions]</linkText><title></title></link> but continue running.
trans-unit.target: If your app catches an exception you can report it with the <link><linkText>TrackException API[apiexceptions]</linkText><title></title></link> but continue running.

trans-unit.source: In that case, it will not be logged as a crash.
trans-unit.target: In that case, it will not be logged as a crash.

trans-unit.source: Monitor crash frequency
trans-unit.target: Monitor crash frequency

trans-unit.source: If you haven't done this already, add <link><linkText>Application Insights to your app project[windows]</linkText><title></title></link>, and republish it.
trans-unit.target: If you haven't done this already, add <link><linkText>Application Insights to your app project[windows]</linkText><title></title></link>, and republish it.

trans-unit.source: Crashes show up on your application's overview blade in <link><linkText>the Application Insights portal[portal]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Crashes show up on your application's overview blade in <link><linkText>the Application Insights portal[portal]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: You can edit the time range shown by the chart.
trans-unit.target: You can edit the time range shown by the chart.

trans-unit.source: Set an alert to detect crashes
trans-unit.target: Set an alert to detect crashes

trans-unit.source: <linkText>From the crashes chart, click Alert rules and then Add Alert</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>From the crashes chart, click Alert rules and then Add Alert</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Diagnose crashes
trans-unit.target: Diagnose crashes

trans-unit.source: To find out if some versions of your app crash more than others, click through the crashes chart and then segment by Application Version:
trans-unit.target: To find out if some versions of your app crash more than others, click through the crashes chart and then segment by Application Version:

trans-unit.source: To discover the exceptions that are causing crashes, open Diagnostic Search.
trans-unit.target: To discover the exceptions that are causing crashes, open Diagnostic Search.

trans-unit.source: You might want to remove other types of telemetry, to focus on the exceptions:
trans-unit.target: You might want to remove other types of telemetry, to focus on the exceptions:

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Learn more about filtering in Diagnostic Search[diagnostic]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Learn more about filtering in Diagnostic Search[diagnostic]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Click any exception to see its details, including associated properties and stack trace.
trans-unit.target: Click any exception to see its details, including associated properties and stack trace.

trans-unit.source: See the other exceptions and events that occurred close to that exception:
trans-unit.target: See the other exceptions and events that occurred close to that exception:

trans-unit.source: Insert trace logs and events
trans-unit.target: Insert trace logs and events

trans-unit.source: To help diagnose problems, you can <link><linkText>insert trace calls and search the logs in Application Insights[diagnostic]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: To help diagnose problems, you can <link><linkText>insert trace calls and search the logs in Application Insights[diagnostic]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>Debug vs Release mode
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>Debug vs Release mode

trans-unit.source: Debug
trans-unit.target: Debug

trans-unit.source: If you build in debug mode, events are sent as soon as they are generated.
trans-unit.target: If you build in debug mode, events are sent as soon as they are generated.

trans-unit.source: If you lose internet connectivity and then exit the app before regaining connectivity, offline telemetry is discarded.
trans-unit.target: If you lose internet connectivity and then exit the app before regaining connectivity, offline telemetry is discarded.

trans-unit.source: Release
trans-unit.target: Release

trans-unit.source: If you build in release configuration, events are stored in the device and sent when the application resumes.
trans-unit.target: If you build in release configuration, events are stored in the device and sent when the application resumes.

trans-unit.source: Data is also sent on the application's first use.
trans-unit.target: Data is also sent on the application's first use.

trans-unit.source: If there is no internet connectivity upon startup, previous telemetry as well as telemetry for the current lifecycle is stored and sent on the next resume.
trans-unit.target: If there is no internet connectivity upon startup, previous telemetry as well as telemetry for the current lifecycle is stored and sent on the next resume.

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>Next steps
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>Next steps
